attributes.action: sack everyone fom haringey social service who had contact with baby p
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can so many people have had contact with this poor baby and not have noticed anything. These people do not deserve a job. They should be named, shamed and sacked and prevented from working with children again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
